newsitem.title: CHINA: Beijing Orient first half net up 29 pct.
newsitem.headline: Beijing Orient first half net up 29 pct.

text.p: Half year ended June 30, 1997 (in millions of yuan unless stated, against first-half 1996 figures):
Earnings per share 0.18 yuan vs 0.20 yuan
Net assets per share 2.58 yuan vs 2.11 yuan
Company name: Beijing Orient Electronics (Group) Co Ltd.

NOTE: The results were calculated under Chinese accounting standards except for net profits which were calculated under both Chinese and international standards. The results were published in the Shenzhen-based Securities Times.
Under international accounting standards, the company's turnover stood at 97.50 million yuan, up 26.4 percent from the year-ago period.
Total outstanding shares were 3.77 billion shares. The company issued 115 million new B shares in June 1997.
